info.senderName: NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 27 at 8:11PM MDT until June 27 at 10:15PM MDT by NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM
info.description:
* WHAT...Arroyo and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...Luna County in southern New Mexico.
* WHEN...Until 1015 PM MDT.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Some low-water crossings may become impassable. Western areas of Deming Ranchettes will be most impacted, but low water crossings west of Rock Hound State Park and north of Spring Canyon may also become inundated as heavy rain spreads south.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 811 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause arroyo and small stream flooding. Between 0.5 and 1.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall of up to 0.5 to 1 inch is expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that may experience flooding include... Deming Ranchettes and Rock Hound State Park. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 PM MDT THIS EVENING
